Hyperliquid Founder: What Gets Us Out of Bed Is Building Finance That "Doesn't Exist"

In October 2024, on the Unchained channel's The Chopping Block podcast, Hyperliquid founder Jeff addressed whether he envies centralized exchanges (CEXs). He noted that while CEXs have clear paths for metric optimization, he is more driven by the challenge of building a financial platform that "doesn't exist" yet. He emphasized that Hyperliquid is not trying to mimic CEXs, and both can coexist without a zero-sum outcome.

Source: https://t.co/YWLuOf8D9V

Price has started to lift from the lower boundary of its range, and if bids continue to defend this base, a gradual rotation toward the upper resistance path could unfold.  üìâ Technical View: ‚Ä¢ Pattern: Multi-stage consolidation evolving into a shallow ascending channel ‚Ä¢ Bias: Bullish, if price maintains structure above rising support ‚Ä¢ Key Level: Diagonal support zone below and descending resistance overhead  ‚úÖFull analytics in telegram->   bit.ly/cryptolingrid       ‚ö†Ô∏è If price slips back under the ascending base and loses compression structure, the bullish setup may be delayed or invalidated.  #HYPE  #Hyperliquid  #HYPE price analysis#

$HYPE /USDT LONG üìà  $HYPE  respected a strong ascending support and reacted sharply from it. Buyers stepped in with strength, and the structure remains bullish. As long as price holds above this support, continuation to the upside is highly probable.

$HYPE  consolidates after breaking out from a bullish falling wedge, as it tries to break above the 20-day moving average. A falling wedge usually produces a spike at breakout, but $HYPE  has been restricted.    However, HYPE will break above the 20-day MA as bullish momentum is building under the surface. The Relative Strength Index (RSI) indicator suggests that the bulls are preparing for a significant move, as the RSI is forming higher lows while the HYPE prices remain stagnant.    When bulls dominate the market, $HYPE  will reach above $30, and if the bulls manage to fully take over, it will hit $36.  #Macro Insights#  #Macro Insights#  #HyperLiquid

VOOI Roadmap ‚Äî Q1-Q2 2026

Aggregation
Proven in demand, VOOI V2‚Äôs model of aggregating DEXs will be reflected on CLOB-based DEXs. VOOI will introduce the first version of a unified trading app that aggregates margin to seamlessly trade across Orderbook-based DEXs (Hyperliquid, Aster, Lighter).

VOOI API
Set to be released later, the VOOI API will provide unified access for perp builders and professional traders with reduced bridge and gas friction.

Unified Margin
Interpolating intents into perp and spot trading across CLOB-based DEXs to power margin/asset transfers across venues and delegates trading.

New Venues
To enhance markets access and availability, new DEXs will be supported and integrated into VOOI app.

New Trading Tools
To intensify trading experience, automation and strategy tools will be available within VOOI application layer.

VOOI Token
Elevating the utility of the native token, conducting anti-inflationary events, expanding the availability across trading platforms.
